item.title: How are Bitcoin ETFs constructed?
item.description:
How are Bitcoin ETFs constructed?

I had a contender this afternoon. My 21 year-old's longtime girlfriend is doing a dance concert on Sunday. When I told her that I was hoping to attend, she thanked me for thinking of her. Me: "But of course. You're family. My daughter-in-love." Girlfriend: "Aw, that just made my whole week."

item.title: Citibank Is Closing Government Accounts of a Country Which Need It the Most
item.description:
Citibank Is Closing Government Accounts of a Country Which Need It the Most

Citibank, the world's 9th largest bank with a US$127 billion market cap , is closing the government accounts of Venezuela. On July 11, the country's President Nicolas Maduro stated during a Council of Ministers meeting at Miraflores Palace in Caracas that Citibank NA is set to shut the Venezuelan government's foreign currency accounts in less than a month.

item.title: Russia's Party of Growth Leader Says Blockchain Means Living without Lies
item.description:
Russia's Party of Growth Leader Says Blockchain Means Living without Lies

Boris Titov, the Presidential Commissioner for Entrepreneurs' Rights in Russia, insists his country should take advantages of the struggling economic situation in the country by becoming one of the leading nations in the blockchain space.

item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Redefining Price Action - NEWSBTC

Here's a look at what we are focusing on in the bitcoin price this morning. Action overnight served up some pretty wild movement, especially on the intraday level, and made it pretty difficult to be in the market at times.

item.title: University of Cantabria Hosts Bitcoin And Blockchain Technologies Course
item.description:
University of Cantabria Hosts Bitcoin And Blockchain Technologies Course

Bitcoin and blockchain courses are gaining in popularity all over the world as of late. A special summer course will be held at the University of Cantabria on July 14 and 15. Various topics will be touched upon, and the course is primarily aimed at professionals, entrepreneurs, and students.

item.title: VC Research Team Suggests London is the Center of Blockchain Fintech Scene
item.description:
VC Research Team Suggests London is the Center of Blockchain Fintech Scene

In late May, the Outlier Ventures research team the launch of the world's most comprehensive blockchain startup tracker. Since its introduction, the Outlier Ventures research team has added nearly 1,000 blockchain startups in the tracker with various information including the details to their projects and other valuable information.

item.title: Changelly Adds Lisk To Their Exchange Platform And Other Tools
item.description:
Changelly Adds Lisk To Their Exchange Platform And Other Tools

Lisk continues to raise a lot of attention in recent weeks. Changelly, a relatively new exchange platform. Adde support for LSK to its instant exchange service. Users of this platform will always get the best rates. Moreover, the company also integrated Lisk into its API and widgets, which are tailored towards usage by other enterprises.

item.title: 3D Printed Implants to Eliminate Surgical Procedures for Bone Fracture Repair
item.description:
3D Printed Implants to Eliminate Surgical Procedures for Bone Fracture Repair

A team of researchers at Evonik Industries has developed 3D printed implants to replace complex and painful medical procedures implemented during the treatment of bone fracture. The German chemical company successfully created the implants when investigating into biodegradable composite materials as a substitute for metal implants.
